name: Lifeless Treasure LD44
description:
Lifeless Treasure is a Top-down shooter game.  
You have to trade you health for various goods.  
The more you buy, the less hits you can take.  

Lifeless Treasure is made with Godot.  
Everything was created in under 48 hours by me.  
I hope you have a great time playing the game!

Controls:
  • Move with: W, A, S, D
  • Dash with: Space
  • Interact with: E
  • Switch weapons: Q
  • Aim with: Mouse
